title: Senior GPU Top Design Engineer
summary: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there is no telling what you could accomplish. Dynamic, smart people and inspiring, innovative technologies are the norm here. The people who work here have reinvented entire industries with all Apple Hardware products. The same passion for innovation that goes into our products also applies to our practices strengthening our commitment to leave the world better than we found it. The Top Design team at the UK GPU Design Centre works on complex, large scale GPU related projects.  We partner with our graphics architecture, functional verification, and physical design teams to deliver high quality graphics IP in order to meet performance, feature, timing, area, and power goals
description:
- Participate in RTL Top-level assembly and triage of GPU designs
- Support integrating IP & design libraries  
- Participate in Top-level micro-architecture development
- Plan, create and execute all RTL deliveries to physical design
- Take part in complex codeline management, supporting multiple products & chips
- Drive improvements and automation to frontend design flow — synthesis, CDC/RDC, LINT etc
key_qualifications:
5+ years design experience including logic synthesis
Proficiency in System Verilog and revision control systems
Understanding of physical design
Experience of scripting languages (Perl/Ruby/Python/Tcl)
Understanding of computer architecture
Ability to work well in a team and be productive under aggressive schedules
